com.phunware.loyalty.link

Interface LinkManager


  • public LinkManager

    A manager that handles all "linking" operations, such as opting the current user into a loyalty coin or linking the current user and their loyalty coin balance to an existing PhunCoin wallet.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void forceDelete(LinkManager.ForceDeleteListener callback)
      Reset all the user's loyalty coin information. This is for internal use only.
      void linkUser(java.lang.String user, LinkManager.LinkResultListener callback)
      Opt the user in to use the loyalty coin.
      void linkWallet(LinkManager.LinkResultListener callback)
      Link the current user with the installed PhunCoin Wallet app.

    • Method Detail

      • linkUser

        void linkUser(java.lang.String user,
              LinkManager.LinkResultListener callback)

        Opt the user in to use the loyalty coin.

        Parameters:
        user - unique identifier for the user, provided by your loyalty system
        callback - Listener called – success or failure with error.

      • linkWallet

        void linkWallet(LinkManager.LinkResultListener callback)

        Link the current user with the installed PhunCoin Wallet app.

        Parameters:
        callback - Listener called with success if Wallet app is installed, or failure if wallet app is not installed.

      • forceDelete

        void forceDelete(LinkManager.ForceDeleteListener callback)

        Reset all the user's loyalty coin information. This is for internal use only.

        Parameters:
        callback - Listener called – success or failure with error.
